mapper.select: select rsrcNo, rsrcNm, zip, addr, daddr, lot, lat, instUrlAddr, imgFileUrlAddr from facility_info where rsrcNm != '야외운동기구'

select d.rsrcClsCd, d.rsrcClsNm, d.rsrcInstCd, d.rsrcInstNm, d.usePsblYn, d.freeYn, d.rsrcIntr, d.atpn, d.lcInf, d.inqTag, d.updYmd, d.bnrImgFileUrl, d.delYn, d.rsrcAprvYn, d.sggCd, d.rsvtNdlsYn, d.lcInsttCd, d.lcInsttNm, f.rsrcNo, f.rsrcNm, f.zip, f.addr, f.daddr, f.lot, f.lat, f.instUrlAddr, f.imgFileUrlAddr from facility_info_detail d, facility_info f where f.rsrcNo = #{fcCode} AND d.rsrcNo = f.rsrcNo

select rsrcNo, rsrcNm, zip, addr, daddr, lot, lat, instUrlAddr, imgFileUrlAddr from facility_info where
rsrcNm like'%'||#{item}||'%'
addr like '%'||#{item}||'%'
OR
daddr like '%'||#{item}||'%'
AND rsrcNm != '야외운동기구'
mapper.insert: insert rsrcNo, rsrcNm, zip, addr, daddr, lot, lat, instUrlAddr, imgFileUrlAddr into facility_info
